title: Oracle Digital Assistant - Hands-on Labs
description: A series of handson labs produced by REAL - the Red Expert Alliance - to get introduced to Oracle Digital Assistant

courses.title: Provisioning an Oracle Digital Assistant instance
courses.description: In this scenario you will provision an Oracle Digital Assistant instance

courses.title: Defining Intents and Entities in an ODA Skill
courses.description: In this scenario you will create an ODA Skill and define Intents and Entities.

courses.title: Implementing the dialog flow in an ODA Skill
courses.description: In this scenario you will implement the skill flow

courses.title: Custom Components to access external data sources
courses.description: In this scenario you will provision an Oracle Digital Assistant instance

courses.title: Setup and customize a web widget to expose your ODA Skill
courses.description: In this scenario you will configure a web widget for your website.
